item.description:
WWW.EASTERNMASSREIA.COM

This Wednesday July 9th

Rockland Radisson Hotel

929 Hingham St.
Rockland, MA

Meeting time is 6:00PM





This Wednesday July 9thEASTERN MASS REIA

This Wednesday July 9th

Rockland Radisson Hotel

929 Hingham St.
Rockland, MA


Meeting time is 6:00PM
Next Monthly Meeting - Wednesday, July 9th
This will be our all-networking summer event. Members may bring a guest for free.
Monthly Meeting: 2nd Thursday of each month - EXCEPT JULY: meeting will be held the 2nd WEDNESDAY, July 9th.
Location: Radisson Hotel 929 Hingham St. Rockland, Ma.
Time: Registration and networking begins @ 6:00 pm.
Monthly Meeting: Members are free.
Visitors $25 at door. Pre-register online by the day before each monthly meeting and save $10!

In June we had our Mentors and Deal Makers, Build Your Power Team Forum

We Learned from those in the know
Local Area Investors and Resources
AboutSubject to's, Trusts and Contracts
Hard Money
Structuring the "Deal"
Buy and Hold
Exit Strategies
Legislation that effects your business
And MUCH MUCH MORE...
STAY INFORMED, KNOWLEDGE IS POWER

Meeting and Seminar location: Rockland Radisson Hotel, 929 Hingham St., Rockland, MA. Map






Thursday May 8th: Supercharge you investing career by creating multiple streams of passive income. We all understand the power of the web; now put it to work for you. Join us as our guest speaker, Tampa Bay, Florida, Real Estate Investors Association founder and ?Marketing Magician? Dan Stojadinovic shares his proven strategies to take your investment business to the next level. You?ll want to be a part of this modern day Gold Rush. Just using a couple of Dan?s suggestions have already increased our site traffic, after all, you?re reading this, aren?t you? Networking begins at 6:00pm.



"EASTERN MASSACHUSETTS REAL ESTATE INVESTORS ASSOCIATION

Rockland Radisson Hotel 929 Hingham St. Rockland, MA (Exit 14 Rt 3) Thursday March 13th 2008 from 6:00-9:30 pm SEE YOU THERE
Food and Refreshments
For more info contact us info@easternmassreia.com
1 888 588 REIA Ext.701






The door fee for monthly meetings is $25. Pre-Register online for $15!
Go to www.easternmassreia.com to preregister

Become a member

Individual $160 Partner/Spouse $275

Business Resource Providers interested in learning about opportunities for sponsorship e-mail us businessresources@easternmassreia.com or call 1 888 588 REIA Ext.701


Eastern Mass REIA is evolving.
Come be a part of the change

I look forward to us having a very prosperous 2008.



Derek Ebrecht



p.s. This is Our monthly networking, education, and deal making event, here at Eastern Mass REIA, if you have a deal let us know.






Eastern Massachusetts Real Estate Investors Association
Eastern Massachusetts REIA does not claim to give expert advice in investing, nor do we endorse what featured speakers say. We do not give professional, legal, financial or tax advice. We suggest that you get competent licensed counsel before putting into effect anything you hear in our club, whether in private conversation or something said publicly. The ideas presented are only meant to stimulate your thoughts in the field of real estate investing and are not to be taken as professional advice. All investing comes with risk; therefore, as adults, it is your responsibility to exercise due diligence before making any purchase, great or small. We encourage you to be careful when ordering coffee at a McDonalds drive through window...coffee is usually hot.
